text: Schuchert can refer to: *Charles Schuchert (1858–1942), US invertebrate paleontologist **Charles Schuchert Award, award named in honor of the above, given by the Paleontological Society *Peter Schuchert, marine biologist and founder of the World Hydrozoa Database *Cape Schuchert Formation, a Silurian rock formation in Greenland *Schuchert Dal Formation, a Permian rock formation in Greenland
title: Schuchert
